yaCMS, a procedural mini-CMS

yaCMS Documentation

yaCMS

A learning project developed while learning at yap-phpro

Modules

This CMS is mainly module based, login, logout, and every other functionality is based on these(and other) modules.

modules

1. First off you have to add your new module's metadata and data in /src/modules.php (please read modules.php page)

2. In /src/modules/ you have to create a folder named like your module's name and in that folder you have to create all the files specified in modules.php

3. See the result by accessing: index.php?show=your_new_module
